attributes.action: allow lesbian couples to have IVF Treatment through the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to petition for the rights of lesbian woman to have help from the NHS in having children, please think of it as if it is you that is desparate for a child, or if it was your daughter, sister, neice, grand - daughter. You may not agree with homosexuality or understand it, but please look at your own children or look to the future what if you were the one who wanted to be a mum but you couldn't. Please join our campaign.
